DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective two-cohort study determine effect chronic antihypertensive therapy new onset atrial fibrillation clinical outcome septic shock .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Chronic Antihypertensive Therapy Clinical Outcomes Septic Shock
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective two-cohort study determine effect chronic antihypertensive therapy new onset atrial fibrillation clinical outcome septic shock . The two cohort septic shock patient : 1 ) either chronic β-blocker angiotensin-converting-enzyme inhibitor ( ACE inhibitor ) 2 ) chronic β-blocker , chronic ACE-Inhibitor , chronic β-blocker ACE-inhibitor
DOC.criteria: Adult patient 18 year age old Diagnosis septic shock require vasopressor therapy ( norepinephrine , epinephrine , phenylephrine , dopamine , vasopressin ) Admitted medical intensive care unit ( MICU ) Rush University Medical Center ( RUMC ) Time frame : 01/01/2012 07/1/2016 Pregnant patient Transfer outside hospital vasopressor Admitted MICU cardiopulmonary arrest Prior arrest within 24 hour admission RUMC
